‡ National team caps and goals, correct as of 22 July 2022

Glory Akumbu Ogbonna (amụrụ na 25 Disemba 1998) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere otu Turkish ALG Spor na otu ụmụ nwanyị Naijirịa. Ọ na-egwuri egwu na Edo Queens na Nigeria Women Football League

N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021, mgbe ha nọ na Austria na ndị Super Falcons nke Naijirịa n'ogige maka asọmpi ịkpọ òkù nke Aisha Buhari, otu klọb bọọlụ ọkachamara nke dị na Umeå nke na-egwu na Elitettan, nke abụọ nke bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị na klọb Sweden, Umeå IK kwupụtara ijide Glory dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ ọhụrụ ha ruo na ngwụcha oge 2022.
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị bọọlụ na Sweden, onye na-agbachitere aka ekpe kwagara Turkey wee bịanye aka na klọb ALG Spor nke dị na Gaziantep na 13 Ọgọst 2022
N'abalị iri na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstu n'afọ 2022, ọ malitere na 2022 2022 UEFA Women's Champions League.
Na ọkwa nke obere, Ogbonna nọchitere anya Naijiria na FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup na 2016 na 2018.

Na 2018 WAFU Women's Cup, onye isi nchịkwa Naijiria, Thomas Dennerby kwuru na arụmọrụ Ogbonna masịrị ya nke ukwuu mgbe asọmpi ahụ gasịrị. Mgbe mbụ ya maka ndị otu okenye na asọmpi ahụ, a kpọrọ ya maka 2018 Africa Women Cup of Nations qualifiers, ma mesịa mee ka ndị otu gaa na asọmpi isi.
